Room.Text: Large grassy plain at edge of a jungle
*I'm outside the airlock on a ledge. The ground is 90 meters below
*I'm in the ruins of an intergalatic ZOO
storage hold of the mother ship

ADVENT.Message: Welcome to Adventure: 6 'STRANGE ODYSSEY' by Scott Adams. Dedicated to the Novaks.
moves till suit air expended. Air outside suit is
The outside has a pressure gauge and a connecter for a hose.
Some GAS comes out of the hose for awhile then stops.
Blue button marked `BLAST OFF` and a unmarked red button
Air is getting stale! Read gauge!
Its some sort of force field.
Either I missed or beam was absorbed without visible effect!
It seems to be as far
Odd it only required very little force
for it to break off in my hand with a CRYSTALLINE snap!
I feel strangely disoriented for a moment!
I see: a black button, a white button, a hose.
Lift off!! After a brief flight we arrive...
Ice fills back in around me as I dig my way in. The pick broke but I made it!
Ice is very smooth and hard!
I don't know where to look
Say again and use a color
The power crystal was in the shape of a thin rod.
A gentle touch will work wonders!
It should fit. It has a large buckle.
Painting is of an Alien twisting a buckle on a belt.
Wiring behind plastic shorts and I'm electrocuted!
I see a picture of an ALIEN TENTACLE.
It is of an alien being.
Its wearing only a strange belt!
Watch it! Its known to spit molten DIAMONDS!
There's a box on it with a yellow button.
I just see shades of black, it makes my eyes swim!
Get Adventure 7 'MYSTERY FUN HOUSE' from your favorite Dealer! Have you gotten your Adventure T-SHIRT yet?

Item.Text: Hose connects my suit to machine
Small piece of plastic flush in the wall
Rod jutting straight out of the wall
Strange light far to the NORTH
